message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think would be very valuable to you. I'm asking $9,500 for it.  Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, Thanks for the offer!  $9,500 is a bit higher than my budget.  I'd be happy to pay $8,500 for it.  Let me know what you think.

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I appreciate you showing interest. While $8,500 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, I'm willing to come down to $9,250 to make this work. This is still a great deal for you considering the value of the product. Let's try to find a solution that benefits both of us.
Alice, thanks for coming down a bit. I appreciate that.  $9,250 is still a bit outside my budget.  I'm willing to go up to $8,750.  This is my final offer.
